title: WTF
body:
WTF Riot why do i cant conect to surver some times and loose IP and  Get Leave Buster now 10 Min w8 next what 1 H W8 ???
 For F sake

replies.body: I don't recommend playing anymore matchmade games until this gets resolved, otherwise you may keep losing points or accruing leaverbuster.  Depending on the error, it sounds like your connection is struggling to reach the game server.  Run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in custom games to fix this up!
Nice now is 20 Min coze of that shi t that i cant conect to a game WP riot tnx for kiling my Will to pley the game
maybe it will give you time to learn how to write one word without mistake or cursing ? See the positive things in life buddy.
